channel.title: Drop in torrent speeds with new modem
channel.description:
I recently switched to a Motorola SURFboard, and after installing it, I noticed a drastic drop in torrent speeds. I used to be able to download at speeds of ~2mb/s, and now I can't seem to get over 600 kb/s, max..
The modem offers a bunch of settings as opposed to nothing being changeable on the old modem.
How do I get my old speeds back ;D
Thanks
Edit: Not sure what it is, but I turned off "NAPT" mode and I'm up to 1mb/s now.

item.title: Drop in torrent speeds with new modem
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

[quote=“TheBeanie, post:7, topic:426369”][quote author=Newty link=topic=529063.msg3860290#msg3860290 date=1324613047]
In my limited experience the motorola surfboard is the worst modem in existence. The 2 years that I used it were just awful lol…
[/quote]

YOUR FLIPPING AVATAR GOT ME AGAIN :@[/quote]

turn avatars off :o

Read full topic

item.title: Drop in torrent speeds with new modem
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

I hate returning electronics after I’ve used them but I don’t see a point in keeping it if it was literally a downgrade from my original router

Another thing I’ve noticed is on mitb only, the loading icon in chrome never goes away even after the page has loaded lol

Read full topic

item.title: Drop in torrent speeds with new modem
item.dc:creator: @teh_spede Teh Spede
item.description:
@teh_spede wrote:

You might have settings that give other things a higher priority than torrenting. Also forwarding ports helps.

Read full topic
item.source: Drop in torrent speeds with new modem

item.title: Drop in torrent speeds with new modem
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

58ms ping 7.1mb down 2.88mb up… I’ve never trusted speedtest though as it never seems to be accurate.

To be clear though, I haven’t changed ISP, services, haven’t moved or anything. The only change is the modem. I don’t see how the modem alone could make my torrent speeds drop so much

Read full topic
item.source: Drop in torrent speeds with new modem

item.title: Drop in torrent speeds with new modem
item.dc:creator: @cumescape cumescape
item.description:
@cumescape wrote:

Torrent speed depends on alot of things… What are you getting from say speedtest.net?

Read full topic
